metadata_only.label: This is a consolidation in your wallet with attached metadata. Funds were moved inside your wallet and only a tx fee was paid.
metadata_only.preview: The create transaction will be a consolidation inside your wallet with attached metadata. Funds will be moved inside your wallet and only a tx fee will be paid.

consolidation.label: This is a consolidation in your wallet. Funds were moved inside your wallet and only a tx fee was paid.
consolidation.preview: The create transaction will be a consolidation inside your wallet. Funds will be moved but only a tx fee will be paid.

simple_send.label: Funds and/or tokens were sent to an external address.
simple_send.preview: Funds and/or tokens will be sent to an external address.
